properties.name: management.health.couchbase.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Couchbase health check.

properties.name: management.health.couchbase.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for getting the Bucket information from the server.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.bootstrap-hosts
properties.description: Couchbase nodes (host or IP address) to bootstrap from.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.bucket.name
properties.description: Name of the bucket to connect to.

deprecation.reason: A bucket is no longer auto-configured.
A bucket is no longer auto-configured.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.key-value
properties.description: Number of sockets per node against the key/value service.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.query
properties.description: Number of sockets per node against the query (N1QL) service.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.queryservice.max-endpoints
properties.description: Maximum number of sockets per node.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.queryservice.min-endpoints
properties.description: Minimum number of sockets per node.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.view
properties.description: Number of sockets per node against the view service.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.viewservice.max-endpoints
properties.description: Maximum number of sockets per node.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.endpoints.viewservice.min-endpoints
properties.description: Minimum number of sockets per node.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.ssl.key-store
properties.description: Path to the JVM key store that holds the certificates.

properties.name: spring.couchbase.env.ssl.key-store-password
properties.description: Password used to access the key store.
